poemName: The sitting down of the opacity brigade
poemContent:
Wuhan

Into the mountain of yellow
They ride; on the backs
of pigs.

Die Meerschweinschen ist tot!
Among the deep, among
The deceased, they sit
Run down the suomi!
Killi on Grillila!



Food of the lost,
forsake this place,
or visage no light
for the moon's
brightness at 2%



Know your
death in
China you will
Stand



Sus

`We are
Ozymandias`

They scream
And sit, into
eternal standing.
